alert.note: Alert for Dundy; Hitchcock (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued January 25 at 11:41PM CST until January 26 at 9:00AM CST by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM MST /9 AM CST/ WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Visibilities as low as zero miles in dense fog. * WHERE...Portions of northwest and west central Kansas, east central and northeast Colorado and southwest Nebraska. * WHEN...Until 8 AM MST /9 AM CST/ Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...With reduced visibilities and the recent snow, locally dangerous travel conditions could be possible. Freezing fog could lead to icy areas on bridges and overpasses.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.
